actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that support and maintenance (in cash or kind) furnished to an eligible individual by members of his or her immediately family shall be disregarded (and shall not serve to reduce his or her supplemental security income benefits) to the extent that it does not exceed $200 a month.

summary.text: Provides under title XVI of the Social Security Act (Grants to States For Aid to Aged, Blind, or Disabled) that support and maintenance (in cash or kind) furnished to an eligible individual by members of his or her immediate family shall be disregarded (and shall not serve to reduce his or her supplemental security income benefits) to the extent that it does not exceed $200 a month.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that support and maintenance (in cash or kind) furnished to an eligible individual by members of his or her immediately family shall be disregarded (and shall not serve to reduce his or her supplemental security income benefits) to the extent that it does not exceed $200 a month.
